Title: Product exactly as advertised
Body: I was extremely skeptical buying a refurbished phone, but figured the XR is new enough to not have major repairs or damage so I went ahead and bought a red one. The phone came in 3 days from ChubbiesTech and I am not exaggerating but there is not a single scuff or mark anywhere on the phone. It is fully unlocked, I just had to go to Metro for a new SIM (could have used my current SIM but it would have cost $17.99 to change devices so I got a new one). All of the features seem to be working flawlessly. I honestly don't think this phone was ever used. It even has 9 months left of warranty through Apple. All in all I am very happy so far!
Phone came with screen protector on. Phone is as good as new. Super happy with this purchase.
